content.raw:
I just built a machine myself. I am getting a realtime factor of .25 to .55 for Qual-1 and Qual-2

Here are the parts that I used:
I7-7700K Kaby Lake CPU: https://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16819117726
16GB of DDR4-2400 memory: http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16820313668
ASrock B250M Motherboard: http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16813157734
RaidMax Case: http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16811156331
Hyper 212 CPU Cooler: http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16835103218
250GB SSD drive: http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=0ZK-00AB-001B4 Got it on sale for 70.00.
GTX 750 TI Video Card: http://www.newegg.com/Product/Product.aspx?Item=N82E16814121855
